root.name: Battle Cars
root.description: Overview Essentially this is F-Zero with weapons and a light post-apocalyptic story. The vehicles control well and you can upgrade your car and weapons by earning credits in racing. Has suitable music as well as good two-player simultaneous competitive mode.Critical Reception Electronic Gaming Monthly awarded the scores of 9,8,7,7 with Ed Semrad writing, "...putting together the best features of the available racers, it comes up as a top-notch cart... The two-player option is an added bonus, it's a great idea to be able to blast opponents... It seems to be one of the best racing games out there".
